posts.post_title: FS: T206 Singles: Back/Printing Variation/HOF etc.
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Matt
T206 For sale, please add $5 to total for shipping:
Will listen to all offers.

Doyle, NY, Bat On NAME ON TOP AND BOTTOM (the card is actually about 1/16" longer then my other T206s and that allows for his full name to appear on the bottom and almost the full name to appear on top). No creases. Piedmont 350. $100
[URL="http://img523.imageshack.us/my.php?image=doylefxl2.jpg"][IMG]http://img523.imageshack.us/img523/4946/doylefxl2.th.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

White, Chicago, No creases. CYCLE 460 Back SOLD
Flick, Cleveland, HOF (only other mainstream card of this Hall of Famer is his M116) Piedmont 150. SOLD
[URL="http://img249.imageshack.us/my.php?image=scan0002le6.jpg"][IMG]http://img249.imageshack.us/img249/8058/scan0002le6.th.jpg[/IMG][/URL][URL="http://img46.imageshack.us/my.php?image=scan0001mp5.jpg"][IMG]http://img46.imageshack.us/img46/5673/scan0001mp5.th.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

Sharp Corners (?EX)- Konetchy, St Louis, Glove Above, Piedmont 150. $75

Sharp Corners (?EX)- Shaw, St Louis, Piedmont 150. $80
